entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming clear late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:38 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
